name: places/ChIJjd4c2-9YwokRMtskFvTeTqo
formattedAddress: 590 Madison Ave 8th Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 590 Madison Ave 8th Floor, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Cochran Realty is an amazing agency. Especially Gayane Avetisyan, as beautiful a person as her name. Most real estate agents see my freshly healing skull cuts and think I was born yesterday and invent new fees. She was very appropriate and gracious and divine. Housing is a human right and she only wanted to get me back home ðŸ˜¢. I wish they controlled Forest Hills Gardens. Which has become exclusive because of redlining blockbusting real estate agencies. She was so intellectually curious about the area, because she realized it's a hidden gem that sells itself. And I taught her so much about the area and gave her books to read. She wanted to be authentic. And she guided me and taught me so much that I'm able to be my own real estate agent. And Cochran Realty group's application process is so upfront about the fair housing rights act. It should be mandated by law. My newly departed mom had a phrase, "you wash my back, I wash yours." I want this agency to have sincere commendations. They adhere to the rule of law. I was raised in Forest Hills Gardens after my father's death by my beautiful aunt who just recently died. And yet I'm unwelcome in my own neighborhood. One landlord even told me, I apologize we don't want people like you here. You're severely disabled and have no income. I have a traumatic brain subsidy, based on all of my years paying into social security. My guarantor is New York City with a AA rating. I'm such a judeo Christian, I cannot bring myself to put a lien against these landlords. They need to get super woke. This is a predominantly a Judeo-Christian neighborhood, founded by Dutch German Protestants. And yet they don't practice what they preach. That's why I continue to pray for them. Once moving back there I will put my youthful exuberance into bringing The Majesty of God back to the Gardens. I'm living with half a brain and yet I'm fully functional and intellectual. I embody God and am  proof that he exists. Never forget. Everyday he lives through me. And he fights all my battles. I'm just a conduit, and there are beautiful people there who feel his energy and it touches their lives. And they go out of their way to be obedient to the greatest story ever told. The Bible and mine. Thank you Cochran Realty from the bottom of my heart. You'll never understand how much you mean to me. Here's to greater successes!

originalText.text: As a real estate broker who has dealt with many brokers and agents,  I highly recommend John Gasdaska and his team. He is professional, doesn't waste your time,  actually LISTENS and never pushes you to buy something you don't actually love.  It took him a couple of years to find me and my husband our lovely home and we became good friends in the process!

text.text: As a real estate broker who has dealt with many brokers and agents,  I highly recommend John Gasdaska and his team. He is professional, doesn't waste your time,  actually LISTENS and never pushes you to buy something you don't actually love.  It took him a couple of years to find me and my husband our lovely home and we became good friends in the process!

originalText.text:
The most unprofessional and inhospitable real estate company I have ever had the displeasure of interacting with. I canâ€™t speak for the entire company (although it seems other reviews can), but Mehmet Yuksekbas and Samantha Beresford were extremely unprofessional. I reached out to Mehmet about my interest in an apartment on August 30th and did not receive so much as a response or acknowledgement from him. I reached out to both Mehmet and Samantha again almost a month later through both text AND email and was AGAIN ignored. In the meantime, the apartment that I was so interested in became unavailable.

Iâ€™m not sure what kind of customer service training these people receive but the very least you can do is REPLY to a prospective client when they reach out to you. I have reached out to dozens of real estate agents throughout New York  and have never received treatment as cold and rude as I did with the Corcoran Group. I do NOT recommend.

originalText.text: Agent named Robert Minchak refuses to unsubscribe me from his email list. I opened complaints with the FTC and the BBB against Corcoran Group because of this guy. Also unkind, my dog was very sick and he pressured me to go in his office and give me his email, all for a quick, greedy buck.

originalText.text: Julian Johnston is a disgusting excuse for a human and loves to bully people. He will resort to absolutely any means to get what he wants, keep one eye open when dealing with him. Better yet, just avoid dealing with him at all.
